TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EventDescriptorCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList

summary.span: 表示 对象集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是只读的;它未实现添加或删除事件的方法。 is read-only; it does not implement methods that add or remove events. 必须继承此类，以实现这些方法。You must inherit from this class to implement these methods. 使用中可用的属性类，可以查询有关其内容的集合。Using the properties available in the class, you can query the collection about its contents. 使用 属性可确定集合中的元素数。Use the property to determine the number of elements in the collection. 使用属性按索引号或按名称获取特定属性。Use the property to get a specific property by index number or by name. 你还可以使用方法从集合中获取具有指定名称的事件的说明。You can also use the method to get a description of the event with the specified name from the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在一个文本框中的按钮上输出的所有事件。The following code example prints all the events on a button in a text box. 它要求`button1`和`textBox1`已实例化窗体上。It requires that `button1` and `textBox1` have been instantiated on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic EventDescriptorCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic EventDescriptorCollection Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic EventDescriptorCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic EventDescriptorCollection Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic EventDescriptorCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic EventDescriptorCollection Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`events`参数为空，则此构造函数创建一个空类。If the `events` parameter is empty, this constructor creates an empty class. 应用于此成员的特性具有以下属性值： 。The attribute applied to this member has the following property value: . 不影响桌面应用程序（通常通过双击图标、键入命令或在浏览器中输入 URL 来启动这些应用程序）。The does not affect desktop applications (which are typically started by double-clicking an icon, typing a command, or entering a URL in a browser). 有关详细信息，请参阅类或[SQL Server 编程和宿主保护特性](~/docs/framework/performance/sql-server-programming-and-host-protection-attributes.md)。For more information, see the class or [SQL Server Programming and Host Protection Attributes](~/docs/framework/performance/sql-server-programming-and-host-protection-attributes.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个新类上使用事件`button1`。The following code example creates a new class using the events on `button1`. 它要求`button1`已实例化窗体上。It requires that `button1` has been instantiated on a form. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以用于设置的一个循环来循环访问的对象的集合的限制。The property can be used to set the limits of a loop that iterates through a collection of objects. 如果该集合为从零开始，请务必使用`Count - 1`作为循环的上限。If the collection is zero-based, be sure to use `Count - 1` as the upper boundary of the loop. > [!NOTE] > 特性应用于此类具有以下属性值： 。The attribute applied to this class has the following property value: . 不影响桌面应用程序（通常通过双击图标、键入命令或在浏览器中输入 URL 来启动这些应用程序）。The does not affect desktop applications (which are typically started by double-clicking an icon, typing a command, or entering a URL in a browser). 有关详细信息，请参阅类或[SQL Server 编程和宿主保护特性](~/docs/framework/performance/sql-server-programming-and-host-protection-attributes.md)。For more information, see the class or [SQL Server Programming and Host Protection Attributes](~/docs/framework/performance/sql-server-programming-and-host-protection-attributes.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用附加属性的事件的数量输出`button1`。The following code example uses the property to print the number of events attached to `button1`. 它要求`button1`和`textBox1`已实例化窗体上。It requires that `button1` and `textBox1` have been instantiated on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic EventDescriptorCollection.Count Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic EventDescriptorCollection.Count Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic EventDescriptorCollection.Count Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic EventDescriptorCollection.Count Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic EventDescriptorCollection.Count Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic EventDescriptorCollection.Count Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引号是从零开始。The index number is zero-based. 因此，必须减去 1 从特定的数字位置访问， 。Therefore, you must subtract 1 from the numerical position of a particular to access that . 例如，若要获取第三个，你需要指定`myColl[2]`。For example, to get the third , you need to specify `myColl[2]`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性可打印的名称在文本框中的索引号指定。The following code example uses the property to print the name of the specified by the index number in a text box. 索引号是从零开始的因为此示例输出的第二个名称。Because the index number is zero-based, this example prints the name of the second . 它要求`button1`和`textBox1`已实例化窗体上。It requires that `button1` and `textBox1` have been instantiated on a form. remarks.format: ## Remarks 搜索名称时，属性是否区分大小写。The property is case-sensitive when searching for names. 即"Ename"和"ename"的名称被视为两个不同的事件。That is, the names "Ename" and "ename" are considered to be two different events. > [!NOTE] > 特性应用于此类具有以下属性值： 。The attribute applied to this class has the following property value: . 不影响桌面应用程序（通常通过双击图标、键入命令或在浏览器中输入 URL 来启动这些应用程序）。The does not affect desktop applications (which are typically started by double-clicking an icon, typing a command, or entering a URL in a browser). 有关详细信息，请参阅类或[SQL Server 编程和宿主保护特性](~/docs/framework/performance/sql-server-programming-and-host-protection-attributes.md)。For more information, see the class or [SQL Server Programming and Host Protection Attributes](~/docs/framework/performance/sql-server-programming-and-host-protection-attributes.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性可打印的组件的类型由索引指定。The following code example uses the property to print the type of the component for the specified by the index. 它要求`button1`和`textBox1`已实例化窗体上。It requires that `button1` and `textBox1` have been instantiated on a form. remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 特性应用于此类具有以下属性值： 。The attribute applied to this class has the following property value: . 不影响桌面应用程序（通常通过双击图标、键入命令或在浏览器中输入 URL 来启动这些应用程序）。The does not affect desktop applications (which are typically started by double-clicking an icon, typing a command, or entering a URL in a browser). 有关详细信息，请参阅类或[SQL Server 编程和宿主保护特性](~/docs/framework/performance/sql-server-programming-and-host-protection-attributes.md)。For more information, see the class or [SQL Server Programming and Host Protection Attributes](~/docs/framework/performance/sql-server-programming-and-host-protection-attributes.md).
